Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 49th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2004...
Injured on 4/26/2004 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/15/2004 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 7 weeks...

Injured on 7/28/2005 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Injured on 5/11/2006 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/2006 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/11/2008 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/3/2008 with a Spasms Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/2010 with a Blister On Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 6/11/2010 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/31/2010 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/27/2012, off Pedro Feliciano (SF)...
Earned first career win on 4/19/2013...
Traded from Atlanta to Los Angeles (A) on 6/22/2014 (Going to LAA: P B. Yasuoka. Going to ATL: CF J. Schafer, LF M. Hildebrant)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 6/30/2017 (Going to LAA: LF A. Vose. Going to PIT: P M. Delcarmen, P B. Yasuoka, 3B D. Diez)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2017, going 2-1, 0.87...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/2018, off Michael Knee (HOU)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Chicago (N) on 6/30/2020 (Going to CHN: P B. Yasuoka, P I. West. Going to PIT: P L. Salazar)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2020, going 4-0, 1.31...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/5/2022 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
